moves.3. Bc4: brucey bishop comes out to cover d5
moves.4. Nc3: neddy 2 comes out to help with the middle-board scrap
moves.4... a6: the bounder blocks my bishop from attacking his neddy
moves.5. O-O: I like to castle, gives the king that warm feeling...either that or it's time for a new adult nappy :oO
moves.5... b5: hmm my bishop is being pressured by black's pesky pawns
moves.6. Be2: ok ~ tucks bishop away out of trouble, but losing ground in the middle board in doing so :o/
moves.7... Nge7: ok a different way of bringing ned#4 out, the gee-gee's are strong though -protecting each other
moves.8... d5: black makes his play for the centre board....fire at will
moves.9... Nxd5: ned#4 comes out to hassle neddy1
moves.11... Be7: nice, bishop has protected King, and is lined up with his queen too
moves.12. Bxg7: yum....g7 prawns sure are tasty ma
moves.13... Qd7: hmm queen wants to get on my King..hmm need to be decisive here
moves.14. Bg3: ok bishop come back here young man - there's pots to wash
moves.14... O-O-O: black castles to queen's side....a tad unusual
moves.15. Nd4: you oaf - what are you doing ? ...get a grip muttit
moves.15... Nxd4: a gift for black thanks to muttit's muppetry *slap*
moves.16. Bd3: time to re-group muttit, get some material back if at all possible
moves.16... h6: ok i thought he might go Rh8  but there you go...
moves.17. c3: ok move the troops out, get neddy get neddy
moves.18. Qh5: queen comes out to try for a tasty prawn on h6
moves.18... Bg5: ohh - a bishop & a pawn locked together...every opponents nightmare :o<
moves.19. Re2: lets see what these rook chappies can do, building pressure on e file
moves.19... d4: i'm feeling a little squashed now...... 'get orf my land'
moves.20. c4: not brilliant but i don't want to unleash that tasty queen / rook combo on the d file
moves.21... Bf4: hmm my king is getting a little scared...
moves.22. Bf5:
ok lets try & halt this nonsense...the black gee gee is going nowhere fast, and his queen is clumsily sat in line of his king 

- hands up if you've been punished for doing that in the past :o/
moves.23. fxg3: ok that pawn will do ~ a nice little threesome is now going on next to muttit's king, looks messy but can be effective
moves.23... Rgh8:
oi I wanted to eat that h6 pawn !

black does rh8 to save his sorry rear-end
moves.24. Re5: hmm now if I can just connect my queen & rook...  ;o)
moves.24... Qc6:
oops !!! :o)

i'll have some of neddy i think ....muuuhhhhaaawwwoooaaaarrr
moves.25. Bxe6+:
The decisive move, black exchanges & takes white bishop with pawn, in the mean time whites rook & queen have connected 

Eureka ka ka ka ka
moves.26. Rxc5: that's the boy, I will be lunching on queen - she is sunk
moves.27... Bxc6: with the material advantage in muttit's court at last...black is in deep doo doo
moves.28. Qc5:
muttit fancies a bit of bishop for pud....and black resigns.
